name: chaos prototype
description:
THE TERRAIN IS FULLY DESTRUCTABLE (except the ground.) 

This is a game that me and a friend of mine made together. 

This is a sandbox game prototype. there are still bugs, so if you find any you can report them. 

Now it is just a sandbox, but there are still further plans.
move with: zqsd or with the arrow keys.
space is jumping. if you click you can shoot.
with the scroll wheel you can change guns.
the first is a semi-auto blaster with no cooldown, the second lets you blow away the cubes and the third is a bazooka with 1 second cooldwon.
Pressing escape pauses the game.
you can also inject blocks there by adjusting the: x, y, z value.
the top spawn is not working properly yet, and destroys your PC and probably crashes the game.
the plan_b works fine (this was really plan b)
Pressing delete or falling from the folder will restart the game.
side notes: the blowing gun deviates downwards so it works best from close range. There are definitely going to be physics engine updates because I love physics
